message.entry: Call site "{0}" is unsupported for code generation.

Call site "{0}" is unsupported for HDL code generation.
Call site "{0}" is unsupported for automated fixed-point conversion.
Call site "{0}" is unsupported for code generation. Calling context is "{1}".
Call site "{0}" is unsupported for GPU code generation. Calling context is "{1}".
Call site "{0}" is unsupported for HDL code generation. Calling context is "{1}".
Call site "{0}" is unsupported for automated fixed point conversion. Calling context is "{1}".
Call site "{0}" is unsupported for code generation in calling context "{1}".
Fixed-point conversion does not support cell arrays.
TRY/CATCH is unsupported for code generation.
Code generation does not support import statements.
Fixed-point conversion does not support nested functions.
Code generation does not support scripts.
HDL code generation does not support break statements.
HDL code generation does not support continue statements.
HDL code generation does not support parfor statements.
HDL code generation does not support return statements inside of loops.
HDL code generation does not support while statements.
Code generation does not support argument validation for repeating inputs/outputs. Remove all class validation, size validation, and validation functions.
Code generation does not support more than one repeating input argument in a function.
Calls to functions that are not supported for code generation.
Code generation does not support growing the size of an array through indexing.
Code generation requires a variable to be fully defined through assignment before subscripting it.
Variable might be used before it is defined.
The output of a call to LOAD is not assigned to a variable. For code generation, assign the output of LOAD to a variable without subscripting.
For code generation, specify a binaryOccupancyMap object in the constructor of the mobileRobotPRM object.
The compilation directive (or pragma) EML is not recommended. Use CODEGEN instead.
The EML namespace is not recommended. Use CODER instead.
Messages reported by the MATLAB Code Analyzer that are not related to code generation.
A coder.loop.Control transform must be immediately followed by a for loop.

The 'HDL' Language option and 'MEX' Environment option can not both be set in ScreenerOptions.
The 'GPU' Language option and 'true' FixedPointConversion option can not both be set in ScreenerOptions.
Only one ScreenerOptions object can be specified for an invocation of coder.screener.
The '-text' argument is no longer supported in coder.screener.
